DTU Eligibility Criteria:
Inclusion Criteria (ALL must apply):
- Stable vital signs
- If patient is post CT scan requiring sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) infusion for eGFR less than 45 mL/min
- Moderate volume depletion: dry mucous membranes, tachycardia +/- decreased skin turgor and decreased urine output
- Mild volume depletion: increased thirst, concentrated urine and a history of decreased fluid intake or increased fluid loss or both
- Self-limiting or treatable cause not requiring hospitalization (eg. hyperemesis gravidarum, gastroenteritis, HONK)
- Mild to moderate electrolyte abnormalities

Exclusion Criteria (ANY may apply):
- Abnormal mental status
- Vital signs outside patient’s own baseline
- HR less than 50 or greater than 130, BP less than 85/50 mmHg , RR greater than 25 breaths/min
- Cardiac dysrhythmia
- Sepsis
- Diabetic Ketoacidosis
- Potassium less than 2.5 mmol/L or greater than 5.5 mmol/L
- Sodium less than 130 mmol/L or greater than 155 mmol/L
- Patient unable to mobilize independently
